net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api.strategy

Interface SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCrawlingDeltaSearchIndexer, AbstractSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy, BasicSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy, SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyLastModified, SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyNone, SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyVcs

    @ComponentSpecification(plugin=true)
public interface SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
    This is the interface for the actual strategy used for the (delta-)indexing of content.
    There are multiple implementations of this interface with different strategies for incremental indexing as well as for indexing from scratch every time. Implementations of this interface are typically stateful and therefore NOT thread-safe.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void index(UpdateStrategyArguments arguments)
      This method performs the actual indexing.
      boolean isResponsible(SearchIndexerSource source)
      This method determines if this SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy is responsible for indexing the given source.

    • Method Detail

      • isResponsible

        boolean isResponsible(SearchIndexerSource source)
        This method determines if this SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy is responsible for indexing the given source.
        Typical implementations will check if the update-strategy matches a specific value.
        Parameters:
        source - is the SearchIndexerSource to index (incremental) according to its update-type.
        Returns:
        true
        See Also:
        SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyManager.getStrategy(SearchIndexerSource)

      • index

        void index(UpdateStrategyArguments arguments)
        This method performs the actual indexing.
        Parameters:
        arguments - are the UpdateStrategyArguments for the indexing.
